nodes.long_description:
Time will melt away as you move your body and explore the globe. Cycle through real world locations, work out with a trainer, surf through city streets, or even test your geography knowledge all while working towards a healthier you. 

We believe that fitness should be fun. So we have designed VZfit to keep you excited and coming back for more.

CHOOSE HOW YOU PLAY

Choose to work out with one of our trainers or turn on some of the great streaming music we offer and get your dance on. Either way, your motion in the real world keeps you moving.

Connect a bike to really kick up your experience. Attach the sensor to the pedal of a stationary bike and off you go! Every ride is now a tour of your favorite destinations, as you visit the snow capped Italian alps or pedal along the sun kissed coast of Oahu.

Looking for something more fast paced? Ring Racer uses our active motion controls to let you race hoverboards through the city streets of the world. Work your way up the leaderboards and unlock banners for your home space.

SO MUCH TO TRY

VZfit is sure to keep you busy with: Challenges- timed events with fun themed character outfits, location guessing game, Pinpoint!, multiplayer, virtual rides, mixed reality, and more. With 10 million miles of road out there, there is something new waiting around every corner.

Ready to ride?

Start your free trial today, or take advantage of our seasonal introductory offer.
nodes.short_description:
Time will melt away as you move your body and explore the globe. Cycle through real world locations, work out with a trainer, surf through city streets, or even test your geography knowledge all while working towards a healthier you. 

We believe that fitness should be fun. So we have designed VZfit to keep you excited and coming back for more.

Dance, Workout, Cycle, Hoverboard there are so many ways to enjoy VZfit. Be sure to explore them all!

nodes.long_description:
Ride to every corner of the world while getting a full-body cardio workout!

EXPLORE
From the snow capped Italian Alps to the sun kissed coast of Oahu, experience our planet’s beauty over 10 million miles of roads through Google Street View**.

MAKE IT YOURS
Create your own rides and share them with the community! Earn coins while riding to customize your rider.

KEEP CONNECTED
Ride with a friend or training partner wherever they are in the world. 

FAMILY FRIENDLY
Free profiles allow everyone using your Quest to track their own stats and progress. One subscription covers the entire family.

Optionally use your bike or elliptical with the addition of a cadence sensor.

Start your journey today with a 7-day free premium trial* to begin your ride around the world.

Where will you ride first?

*$0 for duration of free trial, $9.99/month thereafter. Cancel at any time. Terms apply. Go to vzfit.com for more detail.
**Uses Google Street View data but is not an official Google product.
nodes.short_description:
Have Fun. Explore the World. Get Fit.

Full-body cardio workouts you will actually enjoy!

From the snow capped Italian Alps to the coast of Oahu, workout virtually anywhere.

Optionally use a bike or an elliptical with the addition of a cadence sensor.

Start your journey today with a 7 day free trial!*

*$0 for duration of free trial, $9.99/month thereafter. Cancel any time. Terms apply. Go to vzfit.com for more detail.
VZfit uses Google Street View data but is not an official Google product.

nodes.change_log:
--VZfit 3.3.0--
Improved new user experience with riding and workouts tutorial prioritized
Ring Racer tutorial is now optional at end of the other tutorial or the first time a user selects the map filter for that gameplay
General bug fixes

--3.3.1--
Show the proper Challenge dates on the panel when a future Challenge is scheduled
Fixed the "No Wifi" message to no longer stay up for an extended period of time
Don't show the "New Challenge" popup until the next one has actually started
General bug fixes

--3.3.2--
Cinco de Mayo Challenge added!

--3.3.3--
Mother's Day Challenge added!

--3.3.4--
Father's Day Challenge added!

--3.3.5--
Fixed an issue with saving play sessions when the Oculus menu is brought up

--3.3.6--
Summer Olympics Challenge added!
Minor change to device connection plugin that could help with devices that report a Model without a Make
Slight change in vzCal calculation to allow for high power output from users over brief periods  (sprinting)
Upsell screen for unsubscribed users now correctly says "Sign Up Later" instead of "Replay Tutorial"

--3.3.7--
Additional diagnostics for device connections

--3.3.8--
Road Trip and Halloween Challenges are ready to go!
Challenge unlocks will now be based on a percentage of total distance completed between all rides within the Challenge
-This is to avoid any past problems with unlocks being tied to coin collection
We've made changes to how often ride progress is saved so that no one loses more than 1km of progress effort in the event of a hard crash
Better connection testing for Renpho bikes with newer firmware
Fixed a bug (and crash if you clicked it) where the Equip popup would remain on in between Challenges
Fixed a bug with some debug text listed in the HUD

--3.3.9--
Turkey Trot and Holiday Challenges are ready.
Added a slider for ride distance filtering.
Annotated rides with Asian fonts should now be displaying correctly.
Fixed a server problem that wasn't allowing users on the introductory subscription to later access the free 10 minutes per day.
Fixed a bug where some international lat/lon formats would cause problematic map behavior.

--3.3.10--
Fixed the distance filter maximum to include the longest possible route the player has access to.
Fixed the "Reset" button on the Find Ride panel so that it resets the distance filter correctly.
Don't play the "playing beyond the tutorial requires a subscription" audio if the user is able to play 10 minutes per day.
Likely fix for a crash related to showing help text in Pin Point.

--3.3.11--
Iron Man Challenge added!
Better handling of Feed.FM stations for international users

--VZfit 3.3.0--
Improved new user experience with riding and workouts tutorial prioritized
Ring Racer tutorial is now optional at end of the other tutorial or the first time a user selects the map filter for that gameplay
